item.title: Master Your Job Search with Timeboxing ⏰ • Schedule 2-hour daily search blocks. • Prioritize tasks within each block. • Use a timer to maintain focus. • Review progress at the end of each block. • Adjust your strategy based on results. How can you optimize your job search routine with timeboxing? #productivity #jobsearch #CareerForward #CareerFocused #CareerForge
